django.contrib.sessions.backends.cached_db
==========================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.sessions.backends.cached_db

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Cached, database-backed sessions.



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.sessions.backends.cached_db.KEY_PREFIX


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.sessions.backends.cached_db.SessionStore


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: KEY_PREFIX
   :value: 'django.contrib.sessions.cached_db'


.. py:class:: SessionStore(session_key=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.sessions.backends.db.SessionStore`


   Implement cached, database backed sessions.


   .. py:attribute:: cache_key_prefix
      :value: 'django.contrib.sessions.cached_db'



   .. py:property:: cache_key


   .. py:method:: load()


   .. py:method:: exists(session_key)


   .. py:method:: save(must_create=False)

      Save the current session data to the database. If 'must_create' is
      True, raise a database error if the saving operation doesn't create a
      new entry (as opposed to possibly updating an existing entry).



   .. py:method:: delete(session_key=None)


   .. py:method:: flush()

      Remove the current session data from the database and regenerate the
      key.
